NoBugs.title: NoBug's Snack Bar
NoBugs.unloadWarning: Leaving this page will result in the loss of your work.
NoBugs.runTooltip: Makes the snack man do what the blocks say.
NoBugs.debugTooltip: Makes the snack man do what the next block say.
SnackMan.goToConsumerTooltip: Moves the snack man to the consumer.
SnackMan.askForFoodTooltip: Asks the customer about his order.
SnackMan.goToDisplayTooltip: Moves the snack man to the display.
